body_html: @HouseOfFinwe It does in fact reduce the parameter count considerably, especially in the case of many output channels. Use filters of shape [stride, stride] instead of [1, 1] for the pointwise conv in separable convolution to avoid checkerboarding.
body_text: @HouseOfFinwe It does in fact reduce the parameter count considerably, especially in the case of many output channels. Use filters of shape [stride, stride] instead of [1, 1] for the pointwise conv in separable convolution to avoid checkerboarding.
body: @HouseOfFinwe It does in fact reduce the parameter count considerably, especially in the case of many output channels. Use filters of shape `[stride, stride]` instead of `[1, 1]` for the pointwise conv in separable convolution to avoid checkerboarding.
